art.post: Remeber akiane grew up in a house where there was no t.v., a house where everyone was athiest, so nothing of jesus had ever been heard much less a picture of him. Also akiane didn’t attend a school of any sorts. This insight offers an interesting view that may shed the light on the truthfulness of the painting and akiane’s visions… all of these can be found in Heaven is for real by Todd Burpo on page 143, chapter 27. Akiane’s mother is now a christian..
art.title: More on Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Shroud
